title: From Fondo Amateur to Pro Contract: Monica Trinca Colonel’s Amazing Journey Since Returning to the Sport
content:
Set for San Remo Women on Saturday, Liv AlUla’s rising star quit cycling in her teens, only to rediscover the magic years later.

Read the full article at From Fondo Amateur to Pro Contract: Monica Trinca Colonel’s Amazing Journey Since Returning to the Sport on Velo.
author: sstokes
